; PATTERN DEFINITIONS FOR GAME OF LIFE
; ------------------------------------
;
; Format of a pattern definition:
; W H
; 0010101 ... 0101	each string has exactly W-bit length
; 1010100 ... 1100	and must have exactly H strings
; .
; .
; .
; <an empty line>
;

; number of patterns
12
; GLIDER SHIP
3 3
010
001
111

; CLOCK
4 4
0100
0011
1100
0010

; SPACE SHIP
5 4
00010
00001
10001
01111

; TRAFFIC LIGHT
9 9
000010000
000010000
000010000
000000000
111000111
000000000
000010000
000010000
000010000

; I-COLUMN
3 16
010
010
111
000
000
111
010
010
010
010
111
000
000
111
010
010

;PULSAR
13 13
0011100011100
0000000000000
1000010100001
1000010100001
1000010100001
0011100011100
0000000000000
0011100011100
1000010100001
1000010100001
1000010100001
0000000000000
0011100011100

;MWSS
6 5
011111
100001
000001
100010
001000

;INDEF1
5 5
11101
10000
00011
01101
10101

;INDEF2
8 6
00000010
00001011
00001010
00001000
00100000
10100000

;R-PENTO
3 3
011
110
010

;DIEHARD

;ACORN
